Control.Name: BtnLock
Control.Tooltip: You won't be able to move or resize the windows and they won't pop-up on mouseover.

Control.Name: BtnShowSolo
Control.Tooltip: Show when there is only one person on the threat list

Control.Text: Tip: To stop the windows background to pop-up and block your mouse clicks, tick the "Lock Windows" option.
Control.Name: Description
SliderUpdateRate
Control.Tooltip: How frequent should it update the windows

Control.Text: The notification only show when you are not tagged as a tank.
Control.Name: Description
BtnDifferenceToTank
Control.Tooltip: Only activate if there are any known tank in the threat list and you are not tagged as a tank.
